title: PBE Recover
body:
Hello i hope i'am right here because My PBE Account is disabled 

Username is --------------
Accountname is Yureai

replies.body: That shouldn't be too much of a problem! Reach out to our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and after verifying your Live EUW account, they should be able to reactivate your PBE.
